Could the function be passed as an argument to the decorator itself? Would need to be a `function` style one so the decorator can call it with the instance as `this`
content.formatted_body: Could the function be passed as an argument to the decorator itself? Would need to be a function style one so the decorator can call it with the instance as this

content.body: An earlier version of the decorators proposal had this auto thunking behavior. It was removed for regularity with normal fields and especially static “shape” goals
